snippet: Juan Martin del Potro's first Wimbledon campaign for three years ended as the Argentine crumbled to a 6-7(4) 7-6(6) 7-5 6-1 defeat by Frenchman Lucas Pouille in the third round on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro's first Wimbledon campaign for three years ended as the Argentine crumbled to a 6-7(4) 7-6(6) 7-5 6-1 defeat by Frenchman Lucas Pouille in the third round on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Weary Del Potro Beaten by Pouille but Unbowed
headline.main: Weary Del Potro Beaten by Pouille but Unbowed
